column1: "Where blind hens peck, no grain shall leak: an AI's reach must not exceed its algorithm's tweak."
"Measure twice, code once; ensure thrice, errors none."
"Measure thrice, cut once" becomes "Test AI thrice, deploy once."
"Don't allow the rooster to run the henhouse; AI must not police its own algorithms."
"Stream not against the digital current, yet fail not to install safeguards for turbulent waters."
